title: Patton Got The ‘Rona
description:
This week Meredith and Patton talk about how Patton got Covid while filming in Georgia, they answer some of your emails, and Patton has some picks! Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidyouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
